description:
doc: fix comments referring to removed API funcs
        The strconv package has removed Atob, AtoF{64,32} and Ftoa.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as 21f433a110fc ***

doc: fix comments referring to removed API funcs
        The strconv package has removed Atob, AtoF{64,32} and Ftoa.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5540057

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

http://codereview.appspot.com/5540057/diff/3005/src/pkg/fmt/doc.go
File src/pkg/fmt/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5540057/diff/3005/src/pkg/fmt/doc.go#newcode34
src/pkg/fmt/doc.go:34: of two, in the manner of strconv.FormatFloat(f, 'b', prec, bitSize),
the right edge has become ragged, which is unfortunate. also this is a bit overspecified. how about

in the manner of strconv.FormatFloat with the 'b' format.

subject: code review 5540057: doc: fix comments referring to removed API funcs
